plot: A brave knight fights an evil dragon to save a kingdom from destruction.
Two lovers from different social classes fall in love on a sinking ship.
A team of scientists discovers a dangerous alien species on a distant planet.
A detective investigates a series of mysterious murders in a small town.
A young wizard learns to use magic and fights an evil dark lord.
Superheroes team up to save the world from an intergalactic threat.
A family struggles to survive during a zombie apocalypse.
An underdog sports team fights to win the championship against all odds.
A time traveler tries to prevent a future apocalyptic war.
Spies engage in a high-stakes international espionage mission.
